definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: The bear even made its way to a car dealer's lot.

sentences.english: And they have to put in a certain amount of work time, working at the Food Co-op .
sentences.chinese: 他们得抽出一部分时间去食品供销社工作。

sentences.english: The state grocery monopoly ended in less than one year.
sentences.chinese: 国有供销社不到一年就完全消亡。

sentences.english: Our price is more attractive as compared with that offered by other suppliers.
sentences.chinese: 与其他供销商所报价格相比，我们价格更具吸引力。

sentences.english: What I 'd really like to find out is the result of that competition.
sentences.chinese: 我真想弄清楚那产供销比赛的结果。

sentences.english: The sale system has two kinds: trusting sale and second sale.
sentences.chinese: 出版流通机制分委托供销制和二次销售制两种。

sentences.english: This paper attempts to study this problem-the appropriate arrangement of the production, supply , and marketing of the vegetables in Urumrqi.
sentences.chinese: 本文对乌市蔬菜产供销的合理布局作了尝试性探讨。

sentences.english: After the liberation of all three provincial supply and use.
sentences.chinese: 解放后三家祠堂都为供销社使用。

sentences.english: With the new retail runs counter to, and back to the previous supply and marketing cooperatives era.
sentences.chinese: 与新零售背道而驰，又回到以前的供销合作社时代。

sentences.english: people become members of the Food Co-op.
sentences.chinese: 人们成了食品供销社的会员。

sentences.english: This tells buyers that they are trustworthy.
sentences.chinese: 以此告诉卖家这些供销商是值得信赖的。

sentences.english: At present, there exist many problems in the development of Chinas supply and marketing cooperatives.
sentences.chinese: 目前我国供销合作社发展面临许多困难。

sentences.english: And they have to put in a certain amount of work time, working at the Food Co-op.
sentences.chinese: 他们得抽出一部分时间去食品供销社工作。

sentences.english: The supply and marketing cooperative is the important body of constructing the commodity circulation network of the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 供销社是农村商品流通网络建设的重要主体。

sentences.english: Mengzeyuan Textile Co. , Ltd. Shandong, China is a branch of Supply and Sales cooperative of China.
sentences.chinese: 山东梦泽园纺业有限公司是中国供销社直属企业。
